subject: Horses
Horse Racing
Kentucky Derby
lead_paragraph: The bay colt Orb could well bring his co-owners, Ogden Mills Phipps and Stuart Janney, and his trainer, Shug McGaughey, their first Derby crown.
snippet: The bay colt Orb could well bring his co-owners, Ogden Mills Phipps and Stuart Janney, and his trainer, Shug McGaughey, their first Derby crown.
